title: Lucene-core 2.9.0 missing from Maven Central Repository
description: Sub-projects like lucene-demos, lucene-contrib, etc. exist in central, and depend on 2.9.0 of lucene-core. However, the lucene-core 2.9.0 artifact itself is missing.

comments.content:
We have been alerted and fixed this Ryan. Thanks for raising though. We are now waiting for the artifacts to be replicated out. When you see them show up, can you resolve this?

Thanks a lot!
comments.author: Mark Miller

comments.content: they have been replicated - enjoy guys  Sorry for the delay.
comments.author: Mark Miller
